title: Multitalented

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a target at night, and use all three abilities on them.
- Investikill a player at night, using your investigative ability and your killing ability on them. One use.
- Protectigate a player at night, using your protective ability ad your investigative ability on them. One use.
- Killtect a player, using your killing ability and your protective ability on them. One use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of the game, you roll three abilities; one from a Town Investigative role, one from a Town Protective role and one from a Town Killing role. You may only use these abilities through your own ones listed.
- All relevant attributes from those roles are assumed to apply to the ability.
